node.title: Oscars 2022: Red carpet arrivals at the 94th Academy Award
node.description: From ZoÃ« Kravitz to Venus Williams, here's who showed up in a big way.
node.content: ["The 2021 Oscars ceremony may be remembered more for what it didn't have than what it did   \u2014 no host, no nominees luncheon, no live performances for song nominees.", "But 2022 saw a return to form   \u2014 at least, when it came to the red carpet. Last year's show happened mostly at Los Angeles'\u00a0Union Station, but Sunday's ritual returned the Dolby Theatre, in the heart of Hollywood, along with the ceremony itself. Glitzier looks seemed to be on the rebound, too, with many A-listers opting for bright, bold colors or top-to-toe sparkle.", "Here, Zendaya arrives at the Oscars on Sunday, March 27, 2022, at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles.\u00a0"]
